channel.title: How do i add a custom object not custom item?
channel.description: okay i made a custom object NOT A CUSTOM ITEM. but how do i get the id of it like 2321 so i can put it in makeglobalobjects? because i tried adding it like a custom item but didnt work soo anyone know how?

item.title: How do i add a custom object not custom item?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Use this syntax to add your model in class46

if(i == ####)// Desired Object id { class46.aString739 = "@@@@@@@@@@@"; //object name class46.aByteArray777 = "@@@@@@@@@@@".getBytes(); //examine class46.anInt744 = 1; class46.anInt761 = 1; class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1]; class46.anIntArray773[0] = #####; // Model id class46.aBoolean778 = true; class46.aBoolean767 = false; class46.aBoolean762 = false; class46.aBoolean769 = false; }

The comments should help you put the correct information.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a custom object not custom item?
